parameter.name: testDescription

parameter.value: Log in with remember me enabled, log out and verify that username is pre-filled for next login, press Not You and enter username, password for another user and log in. Logout another user and verify its suggested for next log in

parameter.name: testDescription
parameter.value: Log in with remember me disabled, log out and verify that username is not pre-filled for next login. Enable remember me, log in and log out. Check that username is pre-filled and remember me is enabled

parameter.name: testDescription
parameter.value: Register account, Verify that login to eduID can be done from Swamid Testing on a verified account using Freja eID+ as mfa method

parameter.value: Register account, Add Extra security key in Advanced Settings, Verify the Security key

parameter.name: testDescription
parameter.value: Register new account, add and confirm phone number. Confirm identity by eIDAS and Freja eID

parameter.name: testDescription

parameter.name: testDescription
parameter.value: Initiate Register of new account, verify that incorrect email verification code entered three times aborts email verification process with error message
